# å…³äºé…ç½®æŒ‰é’®

    • <div id="my-lucky"></div>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/lucky-canvas@1.5/dist/lucky-canvas.umd.min.js"></script>
<script>
  let luckyGrid = new LuckyCanvas.LuckyGrid({
    el: '#my-lucky',
    width: '200px',
    height: '200px'
  }, {
    blocks: [{ padding: '5px', background: '#ff4a4c', borderRadius: 10 }],
    buttons: [{
      x: 1, y: 1, borderRadius: 10,
      imgs: [{
        src: '../examples/img/button.png',
        width: '75%',
        top: '20%'
      }]
    }],
  })
</script>

    <template>
  <LuckyGrid
    width="200px"
    height="200px"
    :blocks="blocks"
    :buttons="buttons"
  />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      blocks: [{ padding: '5px', background: '#ff4a4c', borderRadius: 10 }],
      buttons: [{
        x: 1, y: 1, borderRadius: 10,
        imgs: [{
          src: require('../examples/img/button.png'),
          width: '75%',
          top: '20%'
        }]
      }],
    }
  }
}
</script>
